torchnlp.samplers package¶

Submodules¶

torchnlp.samplers.bucket_batch_sampler module¶

class torchnlp.samplers.bucket_batch_sampler.BucketBatchSampler(data_source, sort_key, batch_size, sort_key_noise=0.25, last_batch_first=True, shuffle=True, drop_last=False)[source]¶

Bases: torch.utils.data.sampler.BatchSampler

Reference: https://github.com/allenai/allennlp/blob/e125a490b71b21e914af01e70e9b00b165d64dcd/allennlp/data/iterators/bucket_iterator.py https://github.com/pytorch/text/tree/master/torchtext/data/iterators/#BucketIterator

BucketIterator pools together examples with a similar size length to reduce the padding required for each batch. BucketIterator typically also includes the ability to add noise to the pooling.

The functionality has been replicated as a Sampler to be used with a torch.data.utils.DataLoader.

torchnlp.samplers.noisy_sorted_sampler module¶

class torchnlp.samplers.noisy_sorted_sampler.NoisySortedSampler(data_source, sort_key, sort_key_noise=0.25)[source]¶

Bases: torch.utils.data.sampler.Sampler

Samples elements sequentially with noise.

Reference and inspiration: https://github.com/allenai/allennlp/blob/e125a490b71b21e914af01e70e9b00b165d64dcd/allennlp/data/iterators/bucket_iterator.py

Parameters:
  • data_source (Dataset) – dataset to sample from
  • sort_key (callable) – specifies a function of one argument that is used to extract a comparison key from each list element

torchnlp.samplers.random_batch_sampler module¶

class torchnlp.samplers.random_batch_sampler.RandomBatchSampler(sampler, batch_size, drop_last)[source]¶

Bases: torch.utils.data.sampler.BatchSampler

torchnlp.samplers.sorted_sampler module¶

class torchnlp.samplers.sorted_sampler.SortedSampler(data_source, sort_key)[source]¶

Bases: torch.utils.data.sampler.Sampler

Samples elements sequentially, always in the same order.

Parameters:
  • data_source (Dataset) – dataset to sample from
  • sort_key (callable) – specifies a function of one argument that is used to extract a comparison key from each list element

class torchnlp.samplers.SortedSampler(data_source, sort_key)[source]¶

Bases: torch.utils.data.sampler.Sampler

Samples elements sequentially, always in the same order.

  • data_source (Dataset) – dataset to sample from
  • sort_key (callable) – specifies a function of one argument that is used to extract a comparison key from each list element
class torchnlp.samplers.BucketBatchSampler(data_source, sort_key, batch_size, sort_key_noise=0.25, last_batch_first=True, shuffle=True, drop_last=False)[source]¶

Bases: torch.utils.data.sampler.BatchSampler

The functionality has been replicated as a Sampler to be used with a torch.data.utils.DataLoader.
